Judul: PREDICTING STOCKS MUTUAL FUND  PRODUCT PERFORMANCE USING  MODERN PORTFOLIO CHOICE THEOREM  FINAL PROJECT
Abstrak:
ABSTRACT:  
 
 

Stocks Mutual Fund as one of the risky investments used the basic strategy of diversification. Through its choice of stocks (80-98 percent), Stocks Mutual Funds play with the combination of its stocks as well as its holdings in order to gain the most optimal return with a certain level of risk.  Mean Variance Frontier graph provides each Stocks Mutual Fund a return and risk
